2731.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
2731.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

2732.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
2732.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

2733.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
2733.author: Charles R. Swindoll

2734.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
2734.author: St. Jerome

2735.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
2735.author: Rabindranath Tagore

2736.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
2736.author: Og Mandino

2737.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
2737.author: Walt Disney

2738.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
2738.author: Og Mandino

2739.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
2739.author: Nelson Mandela

2740.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
2740.author: Robert H. Schuller

2741.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
2741.author: Confucius

2742.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
2742.author: Sam Levenson

2743.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
2743.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2744.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
2744.author: Ayn Rand

2745.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
2745.author: Thomas A. Edison

2746.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
2746.author: Norman Vincent Peale

2747.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
2747.author: Confucius

2748.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
2748.author: Helen Keller

2749.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
2749.author: Mark Twain

2750.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
2750.author: Bradley Whitford

2751.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
2751.author: Aristotle

2752.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
2752.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

2753.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
2753.author: Arthur Ashe

2754.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
2754.author: Aldous Huxley

2755.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
2755.author: Ralph Marston

2756.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
2756.author: George S. Patton

2757.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
2757.author: William James

2758.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
2758.author: Tony Robbins

2760.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
2760.author: Walt Disney

2761.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
2761.author: Winston Churchill

2762.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
2762.author: Benjamin Franklin

2763.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
2763.author: Lao Tzu

2764.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
2764.author: Maya Angelou

2765.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
2765.author: Bo Jackson

2766.quote: Well done is better than well said.
2766.author: Benjamin Franklin

2767.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
2767.author: Dalai Lama

2768.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
2768.author: Stephen Hawking

2769.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
2769.author: John F. Kennedy

2770.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
2770.author: Les Brown

2771.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
2771.author: Nelson Mandela

2772.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
2772.author: Victor Kiam

2773.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
2773.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

2774.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
2774.author: Epictetus

2775.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
2775.author: Samuel Beckett

2776.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
2776.author: Zig Ziglar

2777.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
2777.author: Elon Musk

2778.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
2778.author: W. Clement Stone

2779.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
2779.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

2780.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
2780.author: John Dewey

2781.quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again.
2781.author: Og Mandino

2782.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
2782.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

2783.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
2783.author: Philip Sidney

2784.quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
2784.author: Pope John XXIII

2785.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
2785.author: George S. Patton

2786.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
2786.author: Leo Buscaglia

2787.quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
2787.author: Albert Schweitzer

2788.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
2788.author: Walter Elliot

2789.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
2789.author: Napoleon Hill

2790.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
2790.author: Wayne Dyer

2791.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
2791.author: Amelia Earhart

2792.quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
2792.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2793.quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
2793.author: Florence Nightingale

2795.quote: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
2795.author: Muhammad Ali

2796.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
2796.author: Thomas Paine

2797.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
2797.author: Julie Andrews

2798.quote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
2798.author: Jim Rohn

2799.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
2799.author: Thomas Jefferson

2800.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
2800.author: Tom Stoppard

2801.quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
2801.author: John D. Rockefeller

2802.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
2802.author: William Blake

2803.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
2803.author: Jim Rohn

2804.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
2804.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

2805.quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
2805.author: Woodrow Wilson

2806.quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
2806.author: Alfred A. Montapert

2807.quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.
2807.author: Henry Drummond

2808.quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
2808.author: Sasha Cohen

2809.quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
2809.author: Bobby Knight

2810.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
2810.author: H. L. Hunt

2811.quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
2811.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

2812.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
2812.author: Jim Rohn

2813.quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
2813.author: Oprah Winfrey

2814.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
2814.author: Simone de Beauvoir

2815.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
2815.author: William Butler Yeats

2816.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
2816.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

2817.quote: It's always too early to quit.
2817.author: Norman Vincent Peale

2819.quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.
2819.author: George Lucas

2820.quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
2820.author: Unknown

2821.quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
2821.author: Carl von Clausewitz

2823.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
2823.author: H. G. Wells

2824.quote: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.
2824.author: Jimmy Dean

2825.quote: One finds limits by pushing them.
2825.author: Herbert Simon

2826.quote: After a storm comes a calm.
2826.author: Matthew Henry

2827.quote: Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
2827.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

2828.quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
2828.author: Philip Emeagwali

2829.quote: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.
2829.author: Dan Millman

2830.quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
2830.author: Christopher Morley

2831.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
2831.author: Confucius

2832.quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
2832.author: Elbert Hubbard

2833.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
2833.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

2834.quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But... the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?'
2834.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2835.quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.
2835.author: Mia Hamm

2836.quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
2836.author: Natalie Gulbis

2837.quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
2837.author: Malala Yousafzai

2838.quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
2838.author: Christopher Reeve

2839.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
2839.author: Carol Burnett

2840.quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
2840.author: Pauline Kael

2841.quote: Know or listen to those who know.
2841.author: Baltasar Gracian

2842.quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
2842.author: Carl Sandburg

2843.quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
2843.author: Diane Sawyer

2844.quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
2844.author: Edgar Cayce

2845.quote: Hitch your wagon to a star.
2845.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

2846.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
2846.author: George S. Patton

2847.quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
2847.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

2848.quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
2848.author: Henry Ford

2849.quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
2849.author: Jim Rohn

2850.quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
2850.author: Katharine Hepburn

2851.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
2851.author: Peter Marshall

2852.quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
2852.author: Robert H. Schuller

2853.quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.
2853.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2854.quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
2854.author: Thomas A. Edison

2855.quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.
2855.author: Thomas Jefferson

2856.quote: The more we do, the more we can do.
2856.author: William Hazlitt

2857.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
2857.author: Muhammad Iqbal

2858.quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
2858.author: Jessica Savitch

2859.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
2859.author: Dale Carnegie

2860.quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
2860.author: John W. Gardner

2861.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
2861.author: Jack London

2862.quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
2862.author: Ted Turner

2864.quote: Many are called but few get up.
2864.author: Oliver Herford

2865.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
2865.author: Virgil

2866.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
2866.author: William James

2867.quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
2867.author: Eileen Caddy

2868.quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
2868.author: Orison Swett Marden

2869.quote: Wherever you are - be all there.
2869.author: Jim Elliot

2870.quote: We need to accept that the commandments of God aren't just a long list of good ideas. They aren't 'life hacks' from an Internet blog or motivational quotes from a Pinterest board.
2870.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

2871.quote: I like motivational books, because I like the go-getting American spirit - your destiny is in your own hands, life is what you make it, don't accept your limitations, jump before you're pushed, leap before you look.
2871.author: Louise Mensch

2872.quote: My first book was called, 'Mountain, Get Out of My Way,' where I did an autobiographical sketch, if you will, looking back at myself and looking back at things in my life, and juxtaposing them against things that are happening in other people's lives and trying to be motivational.
2872.author: Montel Williams

2873.quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
2873.author: Benjamin Jowett

2874.quote: There is always room at the top.
2874.author: Daniel Webster

2875.quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.
2875.author: Dean Koontz

2876.quote: You have to make it happen.
2876.author: Denis Diderot

2877.quote: Always continue the climb. It is possible for you to do whatever you choose, if you first get to know who you are and are willing to work with a power that is greater than ourselves to do it.
2877.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

2878.quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
2878.author: George Herbert

2879.quote: Never give in and never give up.
2879.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

2880.quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
2880.author: Khalil Gibran

2881.quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
2881.author: Rupert Murdoch

2882.quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
2882.author: Ken Venturi

2883.quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.
2883.author: Lucille Ball

2884.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
2884.author: Mark Caine

2885.quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
2885.author: Michael Korda

2886.quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.
2886.author: Norman Cousins

2889.quote: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it.
2889.author: Phillips Brooks

2892.quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
2892.author: Babe Ruth

2893.quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
2893.author: Brian Tracy

2894.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
2894.author: Denis Waitley

2896.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
2896.author: Allen Ginsberg

2897.quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.
2897.author: Richard Rorty

2898.quote: I think people who are creative are the luckiest people on earth. I know that there are no shortcuts, but you must keep your faith in something Greater than You, and keep doing what you love. Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
2898.author: Judy Collins

2900.quote: Step by step and the thing is done.
2900.author: Charles Atlas

2901.quote: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
2901.author: Sylvia Browne

2902.quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.
2902.author: Joan of Arc

2903.quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
2903.author: George Whitefield

2904.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
2904.author: Kyle Chandler

2905.quote: You never know what motivates you.
2905.author: Cicely Tyson

2906.quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.
2906.author: Woody Hayes

2907.quote: I like to put on hardcore when I have to clean my apartment, which I hate to do, but it's motivational. I like old heavy metal when I'm outside working on my car. Music has definite functions for me.
2907.author: Peter Steele

2908.quote: One of the things that I did before I ran for president is I was a professional speaker. Not a motivational speaker - an inspirational speaker. Motivation comes from within. You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.
2908.author: Herman Cain

2909.quote: I went to a motivational training course once, a course of self-discovery, and I found out after a week that my fear - it was not a fear of not being accepted - was a very violent fear of failure.
2909.author: Emanuel Steward

2910.quote: I'm going to write a book, continue acting, continue motivational speaking and just share with people who I am and what I've learned in my second chance of life and pass it on to people in their first chance of life.
2910.author: J. R. Martinez

2911.quote: I'm thrilled to continue my partnership with U by Kotex for Generation Know while helping to empower girls. I've always been a motivational resource for my younger sisters and hope I can positively impact and inspire other young girls too.
2911.author: Khloe Kardashian

2912.quote: Religious speech is extreme, emotional, and motivational. It is anti-literal, relying on metaphor, allusion, and other rhetorical devices, and it assumes knowledge within a community of believers.
2912.author: Amy Waldman
